iPhone 4s

screen.width        320
screen.height       480
devicePixelRatio    2


When    orientation=portrait,
        scale=1,
        viewport-width=320,
        view=full

innerWidth          320
innerHeight         372


When    orientation=portrait,
        scale=1,
        viewport-width=320,
        view=minimal

innerWidth          320
innerHeight         441


When    orientation=portrait,
        scale=0.25,
        viewport-width=1280,
        view=minimal

innerWidth          1280
innerHeight         1762


When    orientation=landscape,
        scale=1,
        viewport-width=480,
        view=minimal

innerWidth          480
innerHeight         320


When    orientation=landscape,
        scale=0.25,
        viewport-width=1920,
        view=minimal

innerWidth          1920
innerHeight         1280
